recipes.label: Wait
recipes.startdescription:
Sun dips below the horizon. Golden hue spreads across the tranquil sea. A breeze carries the scent of mead and baked bread, meeting the restless waves lapping against the dock.
At the end of the dock, the knight sits in contemplation.
recipes.description: The door of the tavern opens. Someone walks out, holding onto an apron and a knapsack. As they see the knight, their stern expression melts into an uncertain smile.

recipes.label: Conversation
recipes.description: The knight frowns: "You brought everything with you? No more consideration needed?" The soldier simply replies: "I'd follow you anywhere, as long as you'll have me."

recipes.label: Travel to Fort
recipes.startdescription: "We should catch up more later. I haven't even told you about the archbishop." As the knight shows them to the extra horse, the soldier smiles to him: "You'll have plenty of time. Let's go now."
recipes.description: They rode through the town and the forest. The fort sits atop a hillock, with a drawbridge already down. The soldier's mouth hangs slightly open as they enter the fort.

recipes.label: Location Discoverd: Main Hall
recipes.description: The main hall is elaborated decorated with tapestries. The knight explains: "Before the baron left, they renovated the whole fort."

recipes.label: Location Discoverd: Dining Room
recipes.description: The knight lead them to the table: "Have some bread and cheese if you're hungry. They might not be as tasty as the ones you bake. I hope you don't mind."

recipes.label: Location Discoverd: Tower
recipes.description: After showing the soldier their new bedroom, the knight stops before the stairs leading to the tower. "I want to change to a more comfortable tunic. And then, we should go up the tower together."

recipes.label: Location Discoverd: Training Yard
recipes.description: The knight kindly reminds the soldier that training is not for today. Tomorrow, they may spar as much as they want.

recipes.label: Explore the fort
recipes.startdescription: |Knight and their former-soldier friend explore the fort|
